org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts

Class Chart

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts.Chart
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleChart

    public abstract class Chart
extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract class representing some general functionality for a basic chart. This chart may be used as base for chart, that displays multiple combinations of dataset attributes in one chart. For this reason it uses the basic functions to display the points and the background, but omitting function to draw e.g. captions.

    Dataset entities are represented by their [x,y] coordinates in the chart's plain and their values z , that is used by some Colorer object to generate points' color.

    Author:
    siposp
    See Also:
    SingleChart

      • renderPoint

        public void renderPoint(double x,
               double y,
               double z,
               int radius)
        Draws a circle for some dataset entry. To choose the color of the point Colorer set for this chart is used. You can change the colorer by calling setZcolorer(Colorer)
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate in chart space
        y - coordinate in chart space
        z - value of the point
        radius - of the point in pixels

      • renderPoint

        public void renderPoint(double x,
               double y,
               double z,
               int radius,
               Colorer colorer)
        Draws a circle for some dataset entry.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate in chart space
        y - coordinate in chart space
        z - value of the point
        radius - radius of the point in pixels
        colorer - Colorer used to retrieve the points color, based on its value

      • renderPoint

               double z,
               int radius,
               java.awt.Color color)
        Draws a circle for some dataset entry.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate in chart space
        y - coordinate in chart space
        z - value of the point
        radius - radius of the point in pixels
        color - Color point is filled with
